forgotPassword.SuccessMessage: If the email is valid, a password reset link will be sent to your email.
forgotPassword.ErrorMessage: Sorry, we cannot send the email. Please try again later.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.loginMessage: You can now login using your new password.

HomePage.title: Welcome to O-S-M

button.deleteTitle: This action will delete the item
button.restoreTitle: This action will restore the item

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.message: You do not have permission to access this page.

about.title: About Optical Store Management [O-S-M]
about.description: O-S-M is a powerful system designed to help optical shops and companies manage inventory, track orders, generate invoices, handle accounting tasks, and provide powerful analytics and periodic reports.
about.techDescription: Built with Django, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, RESTful APIs, and multilingual support for seamless user experience.

error.title: Error
error.message: An error occurred. Please try again later.
error.redirectMessage: You will be redirected to the home page in 3 seconds...

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Need help? Have feedback or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.name: Your Name
contact.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

heroSection.title: Manage Your Optical Stores with Ease
heroSection.description: A powerful SaaS platform tailored for optical store management. Track sales, inventory, customers & more.

trial.name: Trial
trial.description: Try all features for free for a limited time (1 month)

paymantPage.title: Complete Your Payment
paymantPage.processing: Please wait will redirect to payment...
paymantPage.cash: Please pay in cash at our store.
paymantPage.other: Please contact support for other payment options.

paymentFail.title: Payment Failed
paymentFail.description: Unfortunately, your payment could not be processed. Please try again or contact support.

paymentCancel.title: Payment Cancelled
paymentCancel.description: You have cancelled the payment process. You can try again anytime to complete your subscription.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We value your privacy and commit to protecting your personal data.

section1.title: Information Collection
section1.content: We collect minimal personal data necessary to operate the platform.

section2.title: Data Protection
section2.content: Your data is encrypted and not shared with third parties.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Please read these terms before using our services.

section1.title: Usage Terms
section1.content: You agree to use the platform lawfully and responsibly.

section2.title: Liability
section2.content: We are not responsible for data loss due to misuse.

q1.question: How do I register?
q1.answer: Go to the registration page and fill out your details.

q2.question: How can I contact support?
q2.answer: You can use the contact form or email us directly.

q3.question: Is there a free trial?
q3.answer: Yes, we offer a free trial for 30 days.

support.title: Support
support.description: Need help? Our support team is here to assist you anytime.

section1.title: How to Get Support
section1.content: You can reach out via the contact form or email support@osm.com.

section2.title: Response Time
section2.content: We aim to respond to all queries within 24 hours.

careers.title: Careers
careers.description: Join our growing team and shape the future of optical retail software.

section1.title: Why Work With Us?
section1.content: We offer a collaborative environment, growth opportunities, and meaningful work.

section2.title: Open Positions
section2.content: Currently, we are hiring developers, designers, and sales representatives.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Stay updated with the latest news, tips, and insights from the O-S-M team.

section1.title: Latest Articles
section1.content: Check out our latest articles on optical retail management.

section2.title: Subscribe
section2.content: Subscribe to our newsletter for regular updates.

pages.publicPagesDesc: You can add public pages with default data like (About Us, Contact Us, Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, FAQ, Support, Careers, Blog) in the sidebar.

MultilingualPageEditor.pleaseProvideTitle: Please provide a title for the page
MultilingualPageEditor.noTranslationFound: No translation found for the active language.
MultilingualPageEditor.pageURLDesc: Should not contain spaces or special characters only can use '_' or '-' or  for separating words.
MultilingualPageEditor.pageTitleDesc: Represents the main title of the page.
MultilingualPageEditor.contentDesc: Represents the content of the page.
MultilingualPageEditor.seoTitleDesc: Represents the main title of the page for search engines.
MultilingualPageEditor.metaDescriptionDesc: Represents the description of the page for search engines.
MultilingualPageEditor.metaKeywordsDesc: Represents the keywords of the page for search engines.
